name: MEC Ursus Jacket - Infants
description:
A mid-weight cozy fleece jacket for infants to snuggle up in.Made of anti-pill polyester fleece that’s brushed on both sides for softness.Stretchy trim around cuffs and hood to help seal out the cold.Fold-over cuffs provide some extra protection for little fingers.Full front zipper for easy on and off.Hand me down label and hook hanger loop inside.Fun print for coordinating with other layers.Fit is designed for easy layering.Coordinates with MEC Ursus Pants.Care instructions: Machine wash cold separately. Tumble dry low. Don’t bleach, iron, dry clean or use fabric softeners.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Tight, with no room to spare.





Very close fit, with a bit of room.





Generous, but not oversized.





Oversized with lots of room for layers.


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
